Content:
# smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm

A smart Wezterm workspace switcher inspired by [t-smart-tmux-session-manager](https://github.com/joshmedeski/t-smart-tmux-session-manager) and its successor [sesh](https://github.com/joshmedeski/sesh)

## Usage

ğŸ’¨ Level up your workflow by switching between workspaces âš¡ ***BLAZINGLY FAST*** âš¡ with 1ï¸âƒ£ keypress, the power of fuzzy finding and zoxide! ğŸ’¨

![Demo gif](https://github.com/MLFlexer/smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm/assets/75012728/a4f82fcf-5304-4891-a1e2-346767678dc6)

## Dependencies

* zoxide

### Setup

1. Require the plugin:

Content:
```lua
    local wezterm = require("wezterm")
    local workspace_switcher = wezterm.plugin.require("https://github.com/MLFlexer/smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm")
    ```
2. Apply the default keybinding to the config:

RowTranslations.originContent: 2. Apply the default keybinding to the config:

Content:
```lua
    workspace_switcher.apply_to_config(config)
    ```

Or create your own keybinding, see [Configuration - Keybinding](#Keybinding).

### Configuration:

Content:
#### Changing the Default Workspace Name
You can set a default workspace name:

RowTranslations.originContent: You can set a default workspace name:

Content:
```lua
config.default_workspace = "~"
```

#### Additional Filtering

You can include `extra_args` in the call to `switch_workspace` to filter the results of the zoxide query further. The `extra_args` is just a string concatenated to the command like so: `zoxide query -l <extra_args>`. For example, to select projects from a predefined list in `~/.projects`, call the plugin like this:

RowTranslations.originContent: You can include `extra_args` in the call to `switch_workspace` to filter the results of the zoxide query further. The `extra_args` is just a string concatenated to the command like so: `zoxide query -l <extra_args>`. For example, to select projects from a predefined list in `~/.projects`, call the plugin like this:

Content:
```lua
  workspace_switcher.switch_workspace({ extra_args = " | rg -Fxf ~/.projects" })
  ```

#### Changing elements of the fuzzy finder

You can change the list of elements of the fuzzy finder by setting a new function for `get_choices` likes so:

RowTranslations.originContent: #### Changing elements of the fuzzy finder
You can change the list of elements of the fuzzy finder by setting a new function for `get_choices` likes so:

Content:
```lua
local workspace_switcher = wezterm.plugin.require("https://github.com/MLFlexer/smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm")
workspace_switcher.get_choices = function(opts)
  -- this will ONLY show the workspace elements, NOT the Zoxide results
  return workspace_switcher.choices.get_workspace_elements({})
end
```
Translation:
```lua
local workspace_switcher = wezterm.plugin.require("https://github.com/MLFlexer/smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm")
workspace_switcher.get_choices = function(opts)
  -- this will ONLY show the workspace elements, NOT the Zoxide results
  return workspace_switcher.choices.get_workspace_elements({})
end
```

RowTranslations.originContent: -- this will ONLY show the workspace elements, NOT the Zoxide results
RowTranslations.translatedContent: -- this will ONLY show the workspace elements, NOT the Zoxide results

Content: By default the function uses the following functions to create a list:

RowTranslations.originContent: By default the function uses the following functions to create a list:

Content:
```lua
workspace_switcher.choices.get_workspace_elements({ id: string, label: string }[])
workspace_switcher.choices.get_zoxide_elements({ id: string, label: string }[], {extra_args?: string, workspace_ids?: workspace_ids}?)
```
Translation:
```lua
workspace_switcher.choices.get_workspace_elements({ id: string, label: string }[])
workspace_switcher.choices.get_zoxide_elements({ id: string, label: string }[], {extra_args?: string, workspace_ids?: workspace_ids}?)
```

RowTranslations.translatedContent: workspace_switcher.choices.get_zoxide_elements({ id: string, label: string }[], {extra_args?: string, workspace_ids?: workspace_ids}?)

Content:
#### Updating the Right Status with the Path

To add the selected path to the right status bar, use the `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen` event emitted when choosing a workspace:

RowTranslations.originContent: #### Updating the Right Status with the Path
To add the selected path to the right status bar, use the `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen` event emitted when choosing a workspace:

Content:
#### Events

The following events are available and can be used to trigger custom behavior:

* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.start` - Triggered when the fuzzy finder starts.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.canceled` - Triggered if no element is chosen.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.selected` - Triggered when an element is selected.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.created` - Triggered after creating and switching to a new workspace.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen` - Triggered after switching to a workspace.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.switched_to_prev` - Triggered after switching to a previous workspace.

> [!NOTE]
> The `created` and `chosen` events emit [MuxWindow](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/mux-window/) objects while the others emit [GuiWindow](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/window/index.html) objects. 

Example usage:
Translation:
#### ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆ

ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆãŒåˆ©ç”¨å¯èƒ½ã§ã€ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ å‹•ä½œã®ãƒˆãƒªã‚¬ãƒ¼ã¨ã—ã¦ä½¿ç”¨ã§ãã¾ã™:

* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.start` - ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¸ãƒ¼ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ¼ãŒé–‹å§‹ã•ã‚ŒãŸã¨ãã«ãƒˆãƒªã‚¬ãƒ¼ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.canceled` - è¦ç´ ãŒé¸æŠã•ã‚Œãªã‹ã£ãŸå ´åˆã«ãƒˆãƒªã‚¬ãƒ¼ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.selected` - è¦ç´ ãŒé¸æŠã•ã‚ŒãŸã¨ãã«ãƒˆãƒªã‚¬ãƒ¼ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.created` - æ–°ã—ã„ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¦åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆãŸå¾Œã«ãƒˆãƒªã‚¬ãƒ¼ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen` - ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹ã«åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆãŸå¾Œã«ãƒˆãƒªã‚¬ãƒ¼ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.switched_to_prev` - å‰ã®ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹ã«åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆãŸå¾Œã«ãƒˆãƒªã‚¬ãƒ¼ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

> [!æ³¨æ„]
> `created` ã¨ `chosen` ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆã¯ [MuxWindow](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/mux-window/) ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’ç™ºè¡Œã—ã€ä»–ã®ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆã¯ [GuiWindow](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/window/index.html) ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’ç™ºè¡Œã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ 

ä½¿ç”¨ä¾‹:

RowTranslations.originContent: The following events are available and can be used to trigger custom behavior:
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.start` - Triggered when the fuzzy finder starts.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.canceled` - Triggered if no element is chosen.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.selected` - Triggered when an element is selected.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.created` - Triggered after creating and switching to a new workspace.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen` - Triggered after switching to a workspace.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.switched_to_prev` - Triggered after switching to a previous workspace.

> The `created` and `chosen` events emit [MuxWindow](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/mux-window/) objects while the others emit [GuiWindow](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/window/index.html) objects.

Content:
```lua
  wezterm.on("smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen", function(window, workspace)
    wezterm.log_info("THIS IS EMITTED FROM THE CALLBACK")
  end)
  ```
Translation:
```lua
  wezterm.on("smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen", function(window, workspace)
    wezterm.log_info("THIS IS EMITTED FROM THE CALLBACK")
  end)
  ```

RowTranslations.originContent: wezterm.log_info("THIS IS EMITTED FROM THE CALLBACK")
RowTranslations.translatedContent: wezterm.log_info("THIS IS EMITTED FROM THE CALLBACK")

Content:
#### Workspace Formatter

Set a custom workspace formatter using the following example. For more information, see the [Wezterm formatting docs](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/wezterm/format.html):

RowTranslations.originContent: Set a custom workspace formatter using the following example. For more information, see the [Wezterm formatting docs](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/wezterm/format.html):

Content:
```lua
  workspace_switcher.workspace_formatter = function(label)
    return wezterm.format({
      { Attribute = { Italic = true } },
      { Foreground = { Color = "green" } },
      { Background = { Color = "black" } },
      { Text = "ó±‚¬: " .. label },
    })
  end
  ```
Translation:
```lua
  workspace_switcher.workspace_formatter = function(label)
    return wezterm.format({
      { Attribute = { Italic = true } },
      { Foreground = { Color = "green" } },
      { Background = { Color = "black" } },
      { Text = "ó±‚¬: " .. label },
    })
  end
  ```

Content:
#### Zoxide Path

To define a custom path to `zoxide`:

RowTranslations.originContent: To define a custom path to `zoxide`:

Content:
```lua
  workspace_switcher.zoxide_path = "/path/to/zoxide"
  ```
